text: The Athletic is a website that reports and offers opinions on sports. It is a subscription based service, and reports on both local and national sporting events. It's coverage includes professional sports leaques such as the NFL and NHL, as well as college sports, mixed martial arts, and NASCAR. The Athletic began by covering sports in Chicago. It was soon able to expand, first to Toronto, and then to Cleveland. In 2019, The Athletic began to cover sports from the United Kingdom. In July 2023, the company shut down the New York Times' sports department, let go of or moved its sports staff, and started using The Athletic as the new sports section with different leaders. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2016 establishments in the United States Category:American websites Category:Sports media
title: The Athletic
